quotes.quote: Death is terrifying, but it would be even more terrifying to find out that you are going to live forever and never die.
It is such a terrifying thing to see a man cry.
Marriage is actually really terrifying. It doesn't work for many people.
Pleasure is terrifying because it breaks down the boundaries between people. Embracing passion means living with fear.
Uncovering your real desires can be terrifying. It can also set you spectacularly free.
Death is terrifying and beautiful, a final thing we can all do together.
Terrifying, that the loss of intimacy with one person results in the freezing over of the world, and the loss of oneself.
Once you realise that heroes die, everything becomes that much more terrifying.
Success is terrifying. Like happiness, it is often appreciated in retrospect. It's only later that you place it in perspective. Years from now, I'll look back and say, â€˜God, wasn't it wonderful.'

Natural disasters are terrifying - that loss of control, this feeling that something is just going to randomly end your life for absolutely no reason is terrifying. But, what scares me is the human reaction to it and how people behave when the rules of civility and society are obliterated.
Madness alone is truly terrifying, inasmuch as you cannot placate it by threats, persuasion, or bribes.
The first kiss can be as terrifying as the last.
We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.
To feel is perhaps the most terrifying thing in this society.
It can be so terrifying to open yourself up to true love. That love can be with your mate, with your child, with yourself, because we are ultimately such vulnerable little creatures in this world.
It's terrifying to see someone inside of whom a vital spring seems to have been broken. It's particularly terrifying to see him in your mirror.
It is a terrifying as well as hopeful truth that we tend to bring into being in form whatever we fashion in thought.
The truth is rarely as dreadful or as terrifying as what one imagines.
This terrifying world is not devoid of charms, of the mornings that make waking up worthwhile.
In a world we find terrifying, we ratify that which doesn't threaten us.
People say that being in love is amazing. They lie. It's freaking terrifying.
The threat is generally more terrifying than the thing itself.
Gentleman, it is a terrifying thing for a woman to trust a sinful man.
The most terrifying thing for most everybody in the whole Western World is to take responsibility for your own life and to experience real freedom.
The truth is you only have yourself to offer. And when you come to that realization, it's terrifying, because you think it's probably not enough.
The most terrifying things in the universe came from human minds.
The most terrifying thing is sometimes not what we see, but rather what we are forced to imagine.
Fear of danger is ten thousand times more terrifying than danger itself.
The threat is usually more terrifying than the thing itself.
